overview: Long and Winding Road is a feature documentary filmed over 2 years, including the 2018 & 2019 Independent Venue Week celebrations. Featuring Philip Selway ( Radiohead), the film takes you on a very special journey into independent live music venues across the UK, meeting those who run, work & play in them.
tagline: A Journey Into the Heart of independent Venues
title: Long and Winding Road
